parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions Elena Lasconi, President of USR, and implicitly refers to other candidates by mentioning the upcoming elections and contrasting political stances.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, designed to reach a wide audience. The content is not a private message but a public statement.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The post's primary objective is to persuade voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party in the upcoming elections. It highlights the importance of the elections, presents a stark contrast between USR's vision and that of opposing parties, and explicitly calls on voters to support the USR.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. While the post touches upon political issues, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It presents a partisan viewpoint, advocating for a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The post is not a personal opinion; it's a carefully crafted political message aimed at influencing voters' choices.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3869633213284210</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Teodor Lazar, promotes Elena Lasconi and the USR party in the context of the upcoming parliamentary elections.  The post uses strong language to contrast USR's vision with that of opposing parties, explicitly urging voters to support Lasconi and USR. The presence of a CMF number (CMF 11240015) further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' choices, fulfilling the criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The post's reach (100K-500K) and spend (RON200-RON299) indicate a significant effort to influence public opinion.  While the post does not directly instruct voters at polling stations, its clear intention to sway votes before the election makes it electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Teodor Lazăr, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 3869633213284210) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală, având ca efect influențarea votului în favoarea Elenei Lasconi și a partidului USR. Postarea, cu un buget de RON200-RON299, a atins o audiență estimată la 100.000-500.000 de persoane, conținând mesaje explicite de susținere a Elenei Lasconi și USR, prezentând un contrast negativ față de partidele oponente și îndemnând la vot pentru USR. Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 confirmă caracterul de propagandă electorală.  Această postare încalcă prevederile legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale, având în vedere că este o formă de propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale.  Contact: teodor.lazar@gmail.com, +40740269432, https://www.facebook.com/teodor.lazar.usr/.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
